00074   enum tsv_return_t {
00075     TSV_OK                   =  -1, 
00076     TSV_LINE_BLANK           =  -2, 
00077     TSV_LINE_COMMENT         =  -3, 
00078     TSV_ERR_UNKNOWN          = -11, 
00079     TSV_ERR_NOTFOUND         = -12, 
00080     TSV_ERR_NULL             = -13, 
00081     TSV_ERR_CONVERSION       = -14, 
00082     TSV_ERR_FILEIO           = -15, 
00083     TSV_ERR_FORMAT           = -16, 
00084     TSV_ERR_EOF              = -17, 
00085     TSV_HEADER               = -30, 
00086     TSV_HEADER_LAST          = -31, 
00087     TSV_LEVEL_LAST           = -32, 
00088     TSV_FIND_LAST            = -33, 
00089     TSV_LASTVALUE            = -99  
00090   };
00091 
00093   enum tsv_op_t {
00094     TSV_OP_LT     = 0x01,
00095     TSV_OP_LTEQ   = 0x03,
00096     TSV_OP_EQ     = 0x02,
00097     TSV_OP_GTEQ   = 0x06,
00098     TSV_OP_GT     = 0x04
00099   };
00100 
00102   enum tsv_indexkind_t {
00103     TSV_INDEX_STRING = 0x1,
00104     TSV_INDEX_INT    = 0x2,
00105     TSV_INDEX_DOUBLE = 0x3,
00106     TSV_INDEX_UINT   = 0x4,
00107     TSV_INDEX_ULONGLONG   = 0x5
00108   };
00110   enum tsv_orderby_t {
00111     TSV_ORDERBY_LINE = 0x01,
00112     TSV_ORDERBY_VAL  = 0x02
00113   };
00115   enum tsv_fileformat_t {
00116     TSV_FORMAT_NONE  = 0x00,
00117     TSV_FORMAT_V1    = 0x01,
00118     TSV_FORMAT_V2    = 0x02,
00119     TSV_FORMAT_TABLE = 0x03,
00120     TSV_FORMAT_BAD   = 0xff
00121   };
00123   enum tsv_bindopt_t {
00124     TSV_BIND_OPTIONAL = 0x01, 
00125     TSV_BIND_WARNING  = 0x02, 
00126     TSV_BIND_REQUIRED = 0x04, 
00127     TSV_BIND_NOFLAG   = 0x00  
00128   };
00130   enum tsv_addflag_t {
00131     TSV_ADD_NONE     = 0x00, 
00132     TSV_ADD_KEYS     = 0x01, 
00133     TSV_ADD_COMMENTS = 0x02, 
00134     TSV_ADD_ALL      = (TSV_ADD_KEYS|TSV_ADD_COMMENTS) 
00135   };
